seo.about.description: Medicos: Leader in import and distribution of chemical raw materials in Poland. Check out our products!
seo.services.title: Comprehensive chemical services | Medicos
seo.services.description: We provide comprehensive support for the procurement of chemical raw materials, from order to delivery, together with supply chain management and advice.
seo.materials.title: Offer | Medicos - Leader in the chemical raw materials industry
seo.materials.description: We help you develop and optimise your products. See our extensive range full of proven solutions for the chemical industry.

seo.household-chemicals.title: Household and industrial chemicals | Medicos
seo.household-chemicals.description: We supply stable and effective raw materials for the household chemicals industry. We support the production of high-quality detergents and cleaning products.
seo.cosmetology.title: Półprodukty kosmetyczne | Medicos
seo.cosmetology.description: We offer speciality chemical raw materials for the cosmetic industry. Tested and quality active and auxiliary ingredients for a variety of products.
seo.pharmacy.title: Chemical raw materials in pharmaceuticals | Medicos
seo.pharmacy.description: We offer speciality chemical raw materials for the pharmaceutical industry. Our APIs and additives meet all the required stringent standards.
seo.food-and-supplements.title: Ingredients for food and dietary supplements | Medicos
seo.food-and-supplements.description: We supply key chemical raw materials for the production of dietary supplements and food, always ensuring safety and quality standards.
seo.other-industries.title: Other chemical sectors | Medicos
seo.other-industries.description: We supply speciality chemical raw materials to industries such as automotive, construction and printing. We guarantee quality and safety.
